mapper.insert: insert into account(member_type, genie_id, genie_pwd) values(#{member_type},#{genie_id}, sha2(#{genie_pwd},256))

insert into user(genie_id, user_name, user_tel, user_email, user_zipcode, user_addr, user_detailaddr, user_gender) values(#{genie_id}, #{user_name}, #{user_tel}, #{user_email}, #{user_zipcode}, #{user_addr}, #{user_detailaddr}, #{user_gender})

insert into address(receiver_name, receiver_tel, receiver_zipcode, receiver_addr, receiver_detailaddr) select (#{user_name}, #{user_tel}, #{user_zipcode}, #{user_addr}, #{user_detailaddr}) from dual where genie_id=#{genie_id}
mapper.select: select u.genie_id, u.user_name from user u join account a on a.genie_id=u.genie_id where a.genie_id=#{genie_id} and genie_pwd=sha2(#{genie_pwd},256) and a.withdrawal=1;
select count(genie_id) cnt from account where genie_id=#{genie_id}
